name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Senior Frontend Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in React and modern web technologies. Lead developer at TechCorp Inc. and passionate about clean code architecture.

name: Michael Chen
bio: TypeScript enthusiast and full-stack developer with expertise in Node.js and cloud architecture. Author of multiple open-source libraries and regular conference speaker.

name: Emma Davis
bio: UI/UX designer turned frontend developer with 5 years of experience. Focuses on creating beautiful, accessible web experiences and design systems.

name: Alex Rodriguez
bio: Backend developer specializing in microservices architecture and database optimization. Over 6 years of experience with Python, Go, and cloud platforms.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: DevOps engineer passionate about CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure as code. Leads cloud migration projects for enterprise clients.
